item.title: Bubble Sort
item.description: Bubble Sort Bubble sort is $O(n_2)$ meaning it is: efficient if n is small. efficient if the array is mostly sorted.

item.title: Bubble Sort
item.description: Bubble Sort Bubble sort is $O(n_2)$ meaning it is: efficient if n is small. efficient if the array is mostly sorted.

item.title: Shell Sort
item.description: Shell Sort Shell sort adds one more loop outside [[notes/general/bubble-sort|bubble sort]]. It starts by sorting small overlapping subsets, then makes then smaller but by then the array is mostly sorted.

item.title: Shell Sort
item.description: Shell Sort Shell sort adds one more loop outside bubble sort. It starts by sorting small overlapping subsets, then makes then smaller but by then the array is mostly sorted.

item.title: Sorting
item.description: Sorting Sorting methods [[notes/general/bubble-sort|Bubble Sort]] [[notes/general/shell-sort|Shell Sort]] [[notes/general/quicksort|Quicksort]] [[notes/general/heapsort|Heapsort]] [[notes/general/bucket-sort|Bucket Sort]] Stability A stable sort guarantee to preserve the ordering from a first sort, where the second sort finds the records to be equal.
